projects.name: xCurator
projects.description: of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English. Many desktop publishing packages and web page editors now use Lorem Ipsum as their default model text, and a search for 'lorem ipsum' will uncover many web sites still in their infancy. Various versions have evolved over the years, sometimes by accident, sometimes on purpose (injected humour and the like).

projects.name: Trackr
projects.description: A mini version of Trello where a user can have individual or group projects with a drag and drop function, live chat and shows which user is working on it or completed the task. This project was built with React and Firebase.

projects.name: Nourished
projects.description: An app where a user can search for recipes with the ingredients they have at home. This was a group project with the stack of our choice - React and Firebase. We also used the API from Spoonacular for our application.
